item.title: The Senate Asked Me To Testify About Biden’s Censorship Of The Federalist. Here’s What I Told Them
item.description: 'Our own government secretly and without any due process charged us with thoughtcrimes, convicted us, and sentenced The Federalist to death,' Federali...

item.title: Davis: The Government And Big Tech Censored Americans. It Must Never Happen Again
item.description: 'It is time to return to a world where we can say what we wish without fear of being censored, or deplatformed, or shot dead'

item.title: Democrats Huff About Trump’s DOJ Hours After Revelations Show Biden Agents Spied On Senators
item.description: Democrat timing is disingenuous, coming a day after evidence that former President Joe Biden used the FBI to spy on Republicans senators.

item.title: No, Obamacare Premiums Are Not Doubling
item.description: Contrary to Marjorie Taylor Greene’s claim, most of the Obamacare subsidies are not expiring, for good or for ill.

item.title: Concordia University Wisconsin Gives Christian Colleges A Bad Name
item.description: In the wake of Charlie Kirk’s assassination, Concordia's first response was to prevent a TPUSA chapter from being recognized on campus.
